text: int main ( ) { int t ; long n , i ; long long res ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; res = n ; long long arr [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & arr [ i ] ) ; } long prev = 0 ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( arr [ i - 1 ] > arr [ i ] ) { res += ( i - prev ) * ( i - 1 - prev ) / 2 ; prev = i ; } } res += ( i - prev ) * ( i - 1 - prev ) / 2 ; printf ( "%lld\n" , res ) ; } return 0 ; }
